entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 10 April 2023
